title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Intent to Appoint Individuals to Key Administration Posts â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
July 24, 2020
Today, President Donald J. Trump announced his intent to appoint the following individuals to be Members of the Administrative Conference of the United States for terms of three years:Roger Thomas Severino, of CaliforniaJennifer B. Dickey, of CaliforniaAdrian Vermeule, of MassachusettsRonald A. Cass, of Virginia
